Articles.Content:
Just wanted to say a few things,

This is my formal introduction, usually i don\'t make an intro thread but what i do is just start posting.

I am having insane amounts of fun. I have always been fascinated by space and this game is just right for me. I\'m Glad I found it and i cant wait until I actually buy they game. I currently don\'t have enough money and am saving up (school puts a vacuum pipe in my wallet and takes all my money.) for the game. Also i might start making some mods since my laptop isn\'t the best so KSP runs a bit slow.

Thanks for reading my intro, i hope it wasn\'t TL:DR

~~Daniel G~~

Edited January 25, 2015 by dannyboy1238

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
